items.title: Chris Wood trims India exposure; says geopolitics biggest risk to markets
items.description: A deterioration in the geopolitical situation is the biggest risk to global equity markets, Wood said, which he believes is not yet fully discounted by them

items.title: Stock brokers to offer UPI-based fund blocking or 3-in-1 account from Feb 1
items.description: Qualified Stock Brokers (QSBs) must offer one of these two options, in addition to the current mode of trading

items.title: Bombay Stock Exchange Brokers' Forum names Anup Gupta as chairman
items.description: The appointment has been effected from September 30, the Forum said in a statement

items.title: Investors richer by Rs 110.57 trn so far in 2024 amid high rally in markets
items.description: The market capitalisation of BSE-listed firms soared Rs 110,57,617.4 crore to Rs 4,74,86,463.65 crore ($ 5.67 trillion) so far this year
